oai_dc:dc.dc:title: University of Alberta Graduand Survey, 1992
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Odynak, David
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1992 Graduand Survey was undertaken to assist the University of Alberta in its efforts to improve the quality of education received by students. The survey was conducted in June 1992 in conjunction with the University of Alberta's spring Convocation.
